attributes.additional_details:
It is my belief that we should have a database listing the general whereabouts of pedophiles , Megan's law in the USA does just this and it gives parents more knowledge as to the safety of the area they live in .
I do not advocate listing specific addresses as this would cause problems but basic information such as
age , gender, crime, location.

The sooner we have this database the sooner children will be safer
